title: Curried Tuna Salad with Cinnamon
ingredients: ['2 (180g) tins tuna steaks, drained and flaked', '2 teaspoons mayonnaise', '1 teaspoon Dijon mustard', '1 tablespoon sweet pickle, such as Branston', '2 teaspoons lemon juice', '1 1/2 teaspoons ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon curry powder', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', 'salt to taste']
